peersim.transport
Interface RouterInfo

All Known Implementing Classes:
E2ETransport
public interface RouterInfo

Generic interface to be implemented by protocols that need to be assigned to routers. The idea is that each node is assigned to a router, by invoking setRouter(int) method. Routers are identified by integer indexes (starting from 0), based on the assumption that the router network is static. The router information is then used by different implementations to compute latency, congestion, etc.

Method Summary
 int getRouter()
           
 void setRouter(int router)
          Associates the node hosting this transport protocol instance with a router in the router network.
